Package lord.of.rome

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Armed
    Public interface for classes that can fight.
    Moveable
    An interface that allows implementing classes to move.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BarbarianHorde
    Class that simulates the fraction of barbarian horde.
    Capital
    Class which simulates the concept of empire capital.
    Creature
    Class which represents concept of creature.
    DrawableObject
    The basic abstract class of a lord.of.rome package.
    Empire
    The most important, magnum opus class of whole package - class which simulates the concept of ancient Roman Empire.
    Empire.EmpireDrawer
    Class which represents graphic path of empire.
    Empire.EmpireDrawer.MyMouseListener
    Customized Empire Drawer MouseListener.
    Empire.SoundsOfEmpire
    Class which represents all possible sounds of empire and living creatures.
    Fraction
    Class that simulates concept of fraction, armed version of creature which is able to fight.
    Loader
    Application loader.
    MapPoint
    Composition class that represents concept of point on a map.
    Merchant
    Class which simulates the concept of merchant.
    Place
    Class that simulates concept of place.
    Point
    Class that represents concept of point, the smallest single element on map or coordinate system.
    Road
    Class that represents concept of road.
    RomanLegion
    Class that simulates the concept of roman empire legion.
    Saver
    Class that allows to load and save player score.
    Settlement
    Class which simulates concept of roman empire settlement.
    Stock
    Class which simulates the concept of various kind of stock, products, food, materials and other stuff.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Armed.Weapon
    Enumeration as the possible types of weapon for classes that implement Armed interface.
    Creature.Occupation
    Enumeration class specifying membership of creature to empire allies or enemies.
    MapPoint.Occupancy
    Public enumeration class that holds information about type of unit which occupies specified map point or region.
    Road.Direction
    Public enumeration class that represents all possible movement directions.
    Stock.StockType
    Enumeration class which contains all possible types of stock.
